    • registerCourse

      public boolean registerCourse(int studentId, int courseId, String semester) throws CourseAlreadyRegisteredException, CourseLimitExceededException
      Description copied from interface: StudentServiceInterface
      Method: registerCourse Description: Registers a course for a student.
      Specified by:
      registerCourse in interface StudentServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      courseId - The ID of the course.
      semester - The semester for which the course is being registered.
      Returns:
      True if course is registered successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      CourseAlreadyRegisteredException - If the course is already registered by the student.
      CourseLimitExceededException - If the course limit is exceeded for the student.
